pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Decade: All Riders vs Dai-Shocker (2009, movie)$(br2)Used to access (Dark) Decade's $(l:decade/riders/decade#super_1)Super-1$(/l) form$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:super_1/riders/super_1)Kamen Rider Super-1$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l)
